cause.description:
Many alums do not give to their University because they do not believe they can make a difference.
They can. Give today. Even just a $1. The power of numbers. Give today.
1. The percentage of the alumni base who gives money influences university rankings
2. The amount of the gift is not important; giving something, anything, annually is.
3. Young alumni of the University of Virginia, please consider giving $15 today to help us move up to #15 ranking from #23
cause.mission: Engage young alumni of the University of Virginia in annual giving
cause.name: 15 to 15 - University of Virginia Young Alumni
